menu.title: The 'Fitness' menu
menu.descr: The 'Fitness' menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh fruit and vegetables. A product for active and healthy people. It is a completely new product with optimal price and high quality!

menu.title: The 'Lenten' menu
menu.descr: The 'Lenten' menu is a careful selection of ingredients: no animal products at all, milk from almonds, oats, coconut or buckwheat, the right amount of protein through tofu and imported vegan steaks.

menu.title: The 'Premium' menu
menu.descr: The 'Premium' menu we use not only beautiful packaging design, but also high-quality execution of dishes. Red fish, seafood, fruits - restaurant menu without going to a restaurant!
